quiz.parent_instruction:
General Directions

1. This test consists of 60 multiple-choice questions. Each question in the test has four answer choices. Only ONE is the correct answer.

2. Read each question and answer choice carefully and choose the ONE best answer. Try to answer all the questions.

3. For each correct answer you will be awarded 1 mark and for wrong answer will be given 0 marks. There is no negative marking.

4. Be sure to allocate your time carefully (40 mins) so you are able to complete the entire test within the given time.

5. You may NOT use a calculator or reference materials during the testing session.

6. If you are sure about the answer, you can choose "Save & Next", it will save your answer and move you to the next question.

7. If you are not completely sure about the answer, you can choose the answer and select "Mark for Review & Next". It will come under "Answered & Marked for Review".

8. If you are not at all sure about the answer, you can choose "Mark For Review & Next". It will mark the question for review and take you to the next question.

9. You can revisit the questions marked for review at any time during the test.

10. After you are done with the test, choose "Submit Quiz".
